data.name: HORROR MAZE - Sci-Fi Edition
data.detailed_description:
We are just two friendly apes who learned how to make games in our free time and now love to bring our often crazy ideas to live in all kinds of games. Please expect our games to be smaller, raw experiences. We always love to chat with you guys and greatly appreciate all of your feedback in order to become better game creators.
Just tell us your questions or ideas on the forums, Twitter or Facebook. If you encounter bugs or any problems, we will do all we can to ensure the best support that a drunken ape could possibly give.



Set in a dark, claustrophobic sci-fi arena you will need to collect all the dots in order to escape a truly horrifying maze.
But it‚Äôs not quite that easy. Soon you will recognize that you are not alone.
4 space monsters are hunting your soul and are making the escape to one terrifying experience.



- Play your favorite map with a cool new design
- Collect all the dots in order to escape the sci-fi arena
- Beat the Highscore
- Don‚Äôt get lost
- Survive the attack of the space monsters
- Run for your life

data.short_description: Arcade gameplay with modern sci-fi design. This sci-fi horror game is an homage to one of our favorite arcade games. Collect all the dots without getting caught by the 4 horrifying space monsters to beat the high score.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i3 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything should work.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Who needs that?
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Better harder faster stronger.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: You need it!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X
  • Processor: i3 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any is fine.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes, there is background music.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS XXX
  • Processor: i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: No boobs included, so the graphic doesn't matter too much.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Oh, and also sound effect that you might want to hear.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
